message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $18,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $20,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This feels like a fair compromise to me. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to offer $18,500 for the product. I hope this meets you at a reasonable midpoint.
